sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'

export default class Filter extends Component {
    state = {
        filter: '',
    }

    handleRadioChange = e => {
        this.setState({filter:e.target.value})
    }

    render() {
        return (
        <form className='Filter'>
            <input 
                type="radio"
                id="all"
                name="filter" 
                value=""
                onChange={this.handleRadioChange}
            >
            </input>
            <label htmlFor="all">All</label>
            <input 
                type="radio"
                id="all"
                name="filter" 
                value="game"
                onChange={this.handleRadioChange}
            >
            </input>
            <label htmlFor="all">Games</label>
            <input 
                type="radio"
                id="all"
                name="filter" 
                value="movie"
                onChange={this.handleRadioChange}
            >
            </input>
            <label htmlFor="all">Movies</label>
            <input 
                type="radio"
                id="all"
                name="filter" 
                value="series"
                onChange={this.handleRadioChange}
            >
            </input>
            <label htmlFor="all">Series</label>
        </form>
        )
    }
}
